name: Cuko
tagline: An agency for the digital world.
description:
A modern creative boutique made up of curious, open-minded, innovative and risky people who have experience in different disciplines and cultures.We are dedicated to helping build and meet the needs of today's brands. Developing the ideas and actions that best fit the TODAY of the brand.
We want to create a more conscious, human and transparent world based on permanent curiosity and open mind to understand how the exponential disruption generated by new technologies and cultural change affect the communication of people, brands and companies.
